messages.title: NHS not for sale
messages.content: End health privatisation & bring services back into public hands.

messages.title: Job Guarantee
messages.content: A job for every young person out of work for a year; adults unemployed for 2 years.

messages.title: Rich Pay Fair Share
messages.content: Reverse the millionaire's tax cut, so the rich pay their share.

messages.title: Build Houses
messages.content: Cut rents and help first-time buyers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will tackle animal cruelty, end the badger cull, ban cruelty on hunting dogs and ban animals in circuses. We'll lead the fight against global animal cruelty.

Labour plans to pay a decent wage so people can afford to pay their bills. New generation of skilled workers by a system of post-18 apprenticeships linked to regional colleges. No more zero-hour contracts or exploitation; abolish the Minimum Wage & scrap zero-hour work.
Labour tenancies with rent increases capped. Rip-off letting fees banned.
Protection of our local environment and action on climate change. Need a greener government. David Drew wants one in Stroud. More action nationally; protecting our environment locally.
Wide building programme to tackle the housing problem. Stroud needs homes to buy and rent. Supporting 200,000 homes a year.
Labour's NHS Time to Care fund, funded through a mansion tax on houses over £2m and tackling tax avoidance, put an end to private patient quotas & 48 hour access to a GP.

issues.environment: Need a greener government. David Drew wants one in Stroud. More action nationally; protecting our environment locally.
issues.health: Labour's NHS Time to Care fund, funded through a mansion tax on houses over £2m and tackling tax avoidance, put an end to private patient quotas & 48 hour access to a GP.

housing.content: Wide building programme to tackle the housing problem. Stroud needs homes to buy and rent.

leaflet.personalStatement: Today we are a country where it is almost taken for granted that young people will be worse off than their parents...

endorsements.endorsement: David has the skills necessary to serve all the people of Stroud.

quotes.text: Join Labour today for the future of the next generation.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet includes multiple messages and policies, along with a personal statement from David Drew and a quote from Ed Miliband. It also provides contact and social media information.
